scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.ts" && npm run format-soia && npm run format-python
scripts.format:check: prettier --check "**/*.ts" && npm run format-soia:check && npm run format-python:check
scripts.test: npm run build && soiac -r ./e2e-test && cd e2e-test && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m unittest tests/**.py && cd ..
scripts.test:local: npm run build && soiac -r ./e2e-test && cd e2e-test && python3 -m venv test-env && source test-env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m unittest tests/**.py && cd ..
